            <title>VOA Asia - April 21, 2022</title>
            <description>VOA Asia presents the best and most interesting stories from our veteran reporters covering East Asia and the Pacific. VOA Asia tells what U.S.-Asian relationships might mean in your daily life, and what Asians think about life in the United States.</description>
            <guid>https://www.voanews.com/a/6518532.html</guid>            
            <pubDate>Thu, 21 Apr 2022 18:05:00 -0400</pubDate>

        <item>
            <title>VOA Asia - Asking China to help stop Russia&apos;s attack on Ukraine - March 20, 2022</title>
            <description>Convincing China to side with peace. Japan boosts help for Ukraine. Global business leaves Russia. Malaysian commerce reawakens. A space telescope opens its eyes. Vietnamese coffee sisters. Jim Stevenson hosts VOA Asia.</description>
            <guid>https://www.voanews.com/a/6484176.html</guid>            
            <pubDate>Sun, 20 Mar 2022 18:05:00 -0400</pubDate>
            
                <itunes:author>VOA</itunes:author>
                <itunes:summary>Convincing China to side with peace. Japan boosts help for Ukraine. Global business leaves Russia. Malaysian commerce reawakens. A space telescope opens its eyes. Vietnamese coffee sisters. Jim Stevenson hosts VOA Asia.</itunes:summary>
                <itunes:duration>00:24:59</itunes:duration>
